sections: Highly versatile IT professional with experience in hospitality and industrial software development, testing and maintenance. Focused on building quality software solutions, with acquired deep understanding of core business and using modern software technologies.
Working on web technologies from early days of web development allowed for learning experience on technology trends and their evolution.
Experienced in teamwork and collaboration in large business environments.

history.description: Role of senior developer in a small team. Backend business and web development.
tasks: Development of SFE fiscal service API used for processing fiscal transactions in EMEA region
Country based projects for processing fiscal transactions
Cloud based implementation of SFE fiscal processing service

history.description: Role of senior developer in a small team. Full stack web development of software solutions for hospitality and retail industry.
tasks: Development of HRS Portal platform in ASP.NET Core framework
Database modeling and development with EF Core framework
Various other .NET solutions for interfacing with Oracle hospitality software

history.description: Industrial software development and maintenance with emphasis on Front-End development in Web technologies. Building and maintenance of range of applications related to transformer monitoring systems
tasks: Design and development of TMS transformer monitoring web application in SPA
Created various .NET tools for configuration and maintenance of TMS systems
Deployment and personnel training for TMS systems.

history.description: Development of client software for investment and finance firms
tasks: Development of client software for investment and finance firms

education.title: Faculty of electrical engineering and computing
